sentences.sContent: The houses were left in haste and all the things were abandoned. It is so strange to see pieces of furniture, housewares and numerous photos with no people around.
sentences.sContent_eng: The houses were left in haste and all the things were abandoned. It is so strange to see pieces of furniture, housewares and numerous photos with no people around.
sentences.sCn: 匆忙中人们抛下了房子，任何东西都不可以带走。在空无一人的地方看着这些家具、生活用品和照片，感觉是如此诡异。

sentences.sContent: It is so strange to see pieces of furniture housewares and numerous photos with no people around.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is so strange to see pieces of furniture housewares and numerous photos with no people around.
sentences.sCn: 在空无一人的地方看着这些家具、生活用品和照片，感觉是如此诡异。

trans.tranOther: small things used in the home, for example plates, lamps etc, or the department of a large shop that sells these things
